sentences.en: 250 people were killed in the blast.
sentences.cn: 250人在这次大爆炸中丧生。

sentences.en: A blast of hot air blows in.
sentences.cn: 一股热气吹进来.

sentences.en: A blast of hot air came from the furnace.
sentences.cn: 一股热风从火炉里吹出来.

sentences.en: a long trumpet blast
sentences.cn: 一声悠长的号声

sentences.en: a request for a real old blast from the past.
sentences.cn: 请求得到一份真正的怀旧纪念品。

sentences.en: Blasts of cold air swept down from the mountains.
sentences.cn: 阵阵强冷气流从山上席卷下来。

sentences.en: Clock-radios blast away until you get up.
sentences.cn: 收音机闹钟会一直响到你起床为止。

sentences.en: Cricket: Blast for Ormrod.
sentences.cn: 板球：炮轰奥姆罗德。

sentences.en: I had the gas fire going full blast .
sentences.cn: 我把煤气取暖器开到最大。

sentences.en: Making the album was a real blast.
sentences.cn: 做这个专辑真是一种乐趣。

sentences.en: Musicians blast their brassy jazz from street corners.
sentences.cn: 玩音乐的人在街角大声弹奏起尖锐刺耳的爵士乐。

sentences.en: Not until last week was the project in full blast.
sentences.cn: 工程直到上星期才全部开工.

sentences.en: Oh blast! I’ve forgotten my key.
sentences.cn: 真讨厌！ 我忘了带钥匙。

sentences.en: Run the heater at full blast.
sentences.cn: 把加热器开足.

sentences.en: She had the radio on full blast.
sentences.cn: 她把收音机开到了最大音量.

sentences.en: The buzzer suddenly responded in a long blast of sound.
sentences.cn: 蜂鸣器突然相应地发出了一声响亮的长鸣。

sentences.en: The cement plant is going full blast.
sentences.cn: 水泥厂正大力发展生产.

sentences.en: The first shot missed and blasted a hole in the far wall.
sentences.cn: 第一枪没有打中，在远处墙上射出一个洞。

sentences.en: the heat is on full blast.
sentences.cn: 暖气已开到最高档。

sentences.en: The lights were on full blast.
sentences.cn: 灯火辉煌.

sentences.en: The original planned launch was called off four minutes before blast-off.
sentences.cn: 原定的发射在点火起飞前4分钟被取消。

sentences.en: The plane was blasted out of the sky by a terrorist bomb.
sentences.cn: 飞机在空中被恐怖分子放置的炸弹炸成了碎片。

sentences.en: The station master gave a blast on his whistle and we were off.
sentences.cn: 站长一声哨响，我们出发了。

sentences.en: They set themselves to blast away the barriers to progress.
sentences.cn: 他们正着手炸去前进路上的障碍.

sentences.en: They're trying to blast away the face of the rock.
sentences.cn: 他们试图炸开岩石的表面.

sentences.en: turned the radio up full blast; played the stereo at full blast.
sentences.cn: 把收音机拧到最大音量；把立体音响开到最大音量

words.tran_cn: 爆炸；破坏；由爆破而产生的碎石块；枯萎

phrases.tran_cn: (非正式)纪念物，使人强烈怀旧的东西
n. 气喷净法；空中爆炸
爆破孔；炮眼；钻孔；鼓风口
发射：发射，如火箭的发射
冲击波；爆炸波；爆炸气浪
最大限度：以全速，最大音量或最大容量
◎正旺盛时；处于高潮；正起劲；正在积极进行中

trans.tran_en: an explosion, or the very strong movement of air that it causes

trans.tran_cn: 炸毁，射击，抨击，(表示厌烦)真该死
trans.tran_en: to damage or destroy something, or to injure or kill someone, using a gun or a bomb
to damage or destroy something, or to injure or kill someone, using a gun or a bomb
